configurableConfig.description: Pick "Custom..." in the popup selection to use a particular browser edition or read from a variable.
configurableConfig.label: Custom

configurableConfig.description:
Format examples:
• URL: https://www.alfredapp.com/
• Title: Alfred - Productivity App for macOS
• URL|Title: https://www.alfredapp.com/|Alfred - Productivity App for macOS
configurableConfig.label: Output Format

script:
readonly run_script='../../../../com.alfredapp.automation.core/safari/safari.tabs.current/run'

if [[ "${popup_browser}" == 'custom' ]]; then
  browser="${custom_browser}"
else
  browser="${popup_browser}"
fi

"${run_script}" "${browser}" "${out_format}"
taskDescription: Returns the URL or title of the frontmost Webkit browser tab
